item.title: You can't outrun a bad diet. Food — not lack of exercise — fuels obesity, study finds
item.description: One explanation for the rise in obesity in industrialized countries is that people burn fewer calories than people in countries where obesity is rare....

item.title: A genetic tweak could prevent mosquitoes from transmitting malaria
item.description: A new study reports on a novel way to short-circuit the parasite that spreads the disease so people wouldn't get infected with a mosquito's bite.
